concepts.term: accurately, noninvasively, and in real time
fundamentally changed how we diagnose and treat diseases

evidence: what came out on top? Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) and Computed Tomography (CT). Not even close. These tomographic imaging technologies were voted number one by a considerable margin.
Because they fundamentally changed how we diagnose and treat diseases. They let us see inside the human body in ways that were never possible before-accurately, noninvasively, and in real time.
